directions: Up Coast Meridian then right on Harper to the gun club. Ride the fire road up, stay left about 1km in then a couple km up till you get to a fork in the road, gate on the right fork. Trail drops in directly left of the fork, when you finish the first part of the trail and end up at a double track, go right a ew meters then drop in trail again, stay left when you have finished that part as well then the trail taked you back to the gun club, listen for guns, you cant get lost
title: Vics
